thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: BDS and Palestine

author: news24.com
title: BDS and Palestine
text:
Whereas I support independence for all, BDS is misrepresenting the situation.
They have their own private agenda and probably feel nothing for those people.
I am quite sure if they walk the streets of Tel Aviv or Haifa they would struggle to point out, purely by the physical look of people, who belongs to what faith.
It is with shock and horror that one reads what is happening on the Egypt border with Palestine and not one single word is uttered against the Egyptians. One wonders if this is because of the faith shared by the BDS leaders and those of the Egyptians.
But, then when one looks at the treatment of the Palestinians (as a "nation" one wonders where they come from) meted out by the Arab nations and others whose state religion is connect to the Prophet Mohamed it seems that flagrant human rights abuses are condoned if the "abuser" is not Christian or Jewish.
